00018 AnswerWaiter::AnswerWaiter()
00019 {
00020         ObjectMutex.EnterMutex();
00021 
00022         // Initialise object
00023         Waiter.Reset();
00024         IsFree = true;
00025         MessageId = 0;
00026         AnswerMessage = NULL;
00027 
00028         ObjectMutex.LeaveMutex();
00029 }
00030 
00031 AnswerWaiter::~AnswerWaiter()
00032 {
00033         // ObjectMutex.EnterMutex(); will be done in free
00034 
00035         Free();
00036         
00037         // ObjectMutex.LeaveMutex();
00038 }
00039 
00040 bool AnswerWaiter::Use( unsigned int eMessageId )
00041 {
00042         ObjectMutex.EnterMutex();
00043 
00044         if ( IsFree != true )
00045         {
00046                 ObjectMutex.LeaveMutex();
00047                 return false;
00048         }
00049 
00050         // Delete message if any
00051         if ( AnswerMessage != NULL )
00052         {
00053                 delete AnswerMessage;
00054                 AnswerMessage = NULL;
00055         }
00056 
00057         // Say I am not free
00058         IsFree = false;
00059 
00060         // Put my value for the message waited
00061         MessageId = eMessageId;
00062 
00063         // Reset event
00064         Waiter.Reset();
00065 
00066         ObjectMutex.LeaveMutex();
00067 
00068         return true;
00069 }
00070 
00071 void AnswerWaiter::Free()
00072 {
00073         ObjectMutex.EnterMutex();
00074 
00075         // Delete message if any
00076         if ( AnswerMessage != NULL )
00077         {
00078                 delete AnswerMessage;
00079                 AnswerMessage = NULL;
00080         }
00081 
00082         // Say I am free...
00083         IsFree = true;
00084 
00085         ObjectMutex.LeaveMutex();
00086 }
00087 
00088 XMLMessage * AnswerWaiter::GetAnswer(unsigned int TimeToWait)
00089 {
00090         XMLMessage * tmpMessage;
00091         int NbLoop;
00092 
00093         //
00094         for( NbLoop = 0; ; NbLoop++ )
00095         {
00096                 // Is the message already here ?
00097                 ObjectMutex.EnterMutex();
00098                 if ( AnswerMessage != NULL )
00099                 {
00100                         // Get the message pointer
00101                         tmpMessage = AnswerMessage;
00102                         AnswerMessage = NULL;
00103                         
00104                         // This place is free, we got the message
00105                         Free();
00106 
00107                         ObjectMutex.LeaveMutex();
00108                         return tmpMessage;
00109                 }
00110 
00111                 // Let's me AnswerManager complete me...
00112                 ObjectMutex.LeaveMutex();
00113 
00114                 if ( NbLoop > 0 )
00115                 {
00116                         break;
00117                 }
00118 
00119                 // Wait for the result...
00120                 Waiter.Wait(TimeToWait);
00121         }
00122 
00123         // This place is free, even if we do not get the message
00124         Free();
00125 
00126         return NULL;
00127 }

00133 AnswersManager::~AnswersManager()
00134 {
00135         WaitersList.Lock();
00136 
00137         // Destroy all waiters information
00138         while( WaitersList.GetNumberOfElements() > 0 )
00139         {
00140                 delete WaitersList.ExtractFirst();
00141         }
00142 
00143         WaitersList.Unlock();
00144 }
00145 
00146 AnswerWaiter * AnswersManager::CreateAnswerWaiter(unsigned int MessageId)
00147 {
00148         AnswerWaiter * pWaiterInfo = NULL;
00149 
00150         WaitersList.Lock();
00151 
00152         // Is there any free waiterinfo in my list ?
00153         for( WaitersList.First(); WaitersList.NotAtEnd(); WaitersList.Next() )
00154         {
00155                 if ( WaitersList.GetCurrent()->Use(MessageId) )
00156                 {
00157                         // We've got a waiter info for this waiter...
00158                         pWaiterInfo = WaitersList.GetCurrent();
00159                         break;
00160                 }
00161         }
00162 
00163         if ( pWaiterInfo == NULL )
00164         {
00165                 // Create a new waiter element for this waiter
00166                 pWaiterInfo = new AnswerWaiter;
00167                 if ( pWaiterInfo == NULL )  
00168                 {
00169                         OmiscidError( "AnswersManager::WaitAndGetAnswer: no more memory.\n" );
00170                         WaitersList.Unlock();
00171                         return NULL;
00172                 }
00173                 pWaiterInfo->Use(MessageId);
00174 
00175                 // Add it to the list
00176                 WaitersList.AddTail(pWaiterInfo);
00177         }
00178 
00179         // Unlock the list
00180         WaitersList.Unlock();
00181 
00182         return pWaiterInfo;
00183 }
00184 
00185 bool AnswersManager::CheckMessage(XMLMessage* msg, unsigned int msg_id)
00186 {
00187         xmlAttrPtr attr = XMLMessage::FindAttribute("id", msg->GetRootNode());
00188         if(attr)
00189         {
00190                 unsigned int the_id = 0;
00191                 sscanf((const char*)attr->children->content, "%08x", &the_id);
00192                 return the_id == msg_id;
00193         }
00194         return false;
00195 }
00196 
00197 bool AnswersManager::PushAnswer(XMLMessage * Msg)
00198 {
00199         AnswerWaiter * pWaiter;
00200 
00201         if ( Msg == NULL )
00202         {
00203                 return false;
00204         }
00205 
00206         WaitersList.Lock();
00207 
00208         // Is there AnswerWaiter for this message ?
00209         for( WaitersList.First(); WaitersList.NotAtEnd(); WaitersList.Next() )
00210         {
00211                 pWaiter = WaitersList.GetCurrent();
00212 
00213                 // Lock this waiter
00214                 pWaiter->ObjectMutex.EnterMutex();
00215 
00216                 if ( pWaiter->IsFree == false && CheckMessage(Msg, pWaiter->MessageId) )
00217                 {
00218                         // We've got a waiter info for this waiter...
00219                         // Copy the message for the waiter
00220                         pWaiter->AnswerMessage = new XMLMessage(*Msg);
00221                         pWaiter->ObjectMutex.LeaveMutex();
00222 
00223                         pWaiter->Waiter.Signal();
00224 
00225                         WaitersList.Unlock();
00226 
00227                         // OmiscidTrace( "AnswersManager::PushAnswer: PushMessage ok.\n" );
00228 
00229                         return true;
00230                 }
00231 
00232                 // Unlock the waiter
00233                 pWaiter->ObjectMutex.LeaveMutex();
00234         }
00235 
00236         // Do nothing with this message... probably timeout...
00237         OmiscidTrace( "AnswersManager::PushAnswer: no waiters (probably timeout).\n" );
00238 
00239         // Unlock the list
00240         WaitersList.Unlock();
00241 
00242         return false;
00243 }

00246 ControlClient::ControlClient(unsigned int serviceId)
00247 : TcpClient(), id(1)
00248 {
00249         TcpClient::SetTcpNoDelay(true);
00250 
00251         TcpClient::SetServiceId(serviceId);
00252 
00253         // Ask to receive messge on my XMLTreeParser side
00254         TcpClient::AddCallbackObject( this );
00255 
00256         // XMLTreeParser::StartThread();
00257 
00258         // By default, I will process the ConrolFlow by myself
00259         callback    = NULL;
00260         userDataPtr = 0;
00261 
00262         // In order to check parse data
00263         // Initialise XsdValidators for :
00264         // - control answer validation
00265         ControlAnswerValidator.CreateSchemaFromString( ControlAnswerXsdSchema );
00266 #ifdef DEBUG
00267         // - control query validation in debug mode
00268         ControlQueryValidator.CreateSchemaFromString( ControlQueryXsdSchema );
00269 #endif
00270 }

00276         while( List.GetNumberOfElements() > 0 )

00280                 {
00281                         delete pAtt;

00287 void ControlClient::Init()
00288 {
00289         VariableAttribut * pVar;
00290 
00291         // Empty variable names lists
00292         listVariableName.Empty();
00293         listInputName.Empty();
00294         listOutputName.Empty();
00295         listInOutputName.Empty();
00296 
00297         // Empty InOutputAttribut lists
00298         EmptyInOutputAttributList( listInputAttr );
00299         EmptyInOutputAttributList( listOutputAttr );
00300         EmptyInOutputAttributList( listInOutputAttr );
00301 
00302         // Empty VariableAttribnut list
00303         while( listVariableAttr.GetNumberOfElements() > 0 )
00304         {
00305                 pVar = listVariableAttr.GetCurrent();
00306                 if ( pVar != NULL )
00307                 {
00308                         delete pVar;
00309                 }
00310         }
00311 }
00312 
00313 ControlClient::~ControlClient()
00314 {
00315         TcpClient::RemoveAllCallbackObjects();
00316         TcpClient::Stop();
00317 
00318         XMLTreeParser::StopThread(0);
00319 
00320         for(listVariableAttr.First(); listVariableAttr.NotAtEnd();
00321                 listVariableAttr.Next())
00322         {
00323                 delete listVariableAttr.GetCurrent();
00324                 listVariableAttr.RemoveCurrent();
00325         }
00326 
00327         for(listInputAttr.First(); listInputAttr.NotAtEnd(); listInputAttr.Next())
00328         {
00329                 delete listInputAttr.GetCurrent();
00330                 listInputAttr.RemoveCurrent();
00331         }
00332 
00333         for(listOutputAttr.First(); listOutputAttr.NotAtEnd();
00334                 listOutputAttr.Next())
00335         {
00336                 delete listOutputAttr.GetCurrent();
00337                 listOutputAttr.RemoveCurrent();
00338         }  
00339 }

00341 bool ControlClient::ConnectToCtrlServer(const SimpleString host, int port)
00342 {
00343         try
00344         {
00345                 // We do not need now a XmlTreeParser
00346                 XMLTreeParser::StartThread();
00347                 ConnectToServer(host, port);
00348                 return true;
00349         }
00350         catch(SocketException& e)
00351         {
00352                 e.Display();
00353                 return false;
00354         }
00355 }

00357 bool ControlClient::QueryGlobalDescription()
00358 {
00359         SimpleString requete("");
00360         XMLMessage* msg = QueryToServer(requete);
00361         if(msg)
00362         {
00363                 ProcessGlobalDescription(msg);
00364                 delete msg;
00365                 return true;
00366         }
00367         return false;
00368 }
00369 
00370 VariableAttribut* ControlClient::QueryVariableDescription(const SimpleString var_name)
00371 {
00372         VariableAttribut* var_attr = FindVariable(var_name);
00373 
00374         bool name_in_list = true;
00375 
00376         if(!var_attr)
00377         {
00378                 if(!NameInList(var_name, listVariableName))
00379                 {
00380                         OmiscidTrace( "Unknown variable '%s', ask to the service.\n", var_name.GetStr());
00381                         name_in_list = false;
00382                 }
00383         }
00384 
00385         SimpleString requete = "<variable name=\"" + var_name + "\"/>";
00386         XMLMessage* msg = QueryToServer(requete);
00387         if(msg)
00388         {
00389                 VariableAttribut* attr = NULL;
00390                 if(msg->GetRootNode()->children != NULL)
00391                 {
00392                         attr = ProcessVariableDescription(msg->GetRootNode()->children, var_attr);      
00393                 }
00394                 if(!var_attr && attr) listVariableAttr.Add(attr);
00395                 else if(var_attr && !attr)
00396                 {
00397                         listVariableAttr.Remove(var_attr);
00398                         delete var_attr;
00399                 }
00400 
00401                 if(name_in_list && !attr) listVariableName.Remove(var_name);
00402                 else if(!name_in_list && attr)  listVariableName.Add(var_name);           
00403 
00404 
00405                 delete msg;
00406                 //std::cerr << "Retour de Process\n";
00407                 return attr;
00408         }
00409         //std::cerr << "No Message \n";
00410         return NULL;
00411 }

00414 VariableAttribut* ControlClient::QueryVariableModif(const SimpleString var_name, const SimpleString value_str)
00415 {
00416         VariableAttribut* var_attr = FindVariable(var_name);
00417         if(!var_attr)
00418         {    
00419                 OmiscidTrace( "Unknown Variable '%s' : Not Available Description.\n", var_name.GetStr());
00420                 return NULL;
00421         }
00422 
00423         SimpleString requete = "<variable name=\"" + SimpleString(var_name) + "\">";
00424 
00425 
00426         requete +=  "<value>";
00427         VariableAttribut::PutAValueInCData(value_str, requete);
00428         requete += "</value>";
00429         requete += "</variable>";
00430         XMLMessage* msg = QueryToServer(requete);
00431         if(msg)
00432         {
00433                 VariableAttribut* attr = NULL;
00434                 if(msg->GetRootNode()->children != NULL)
00435                 {
00436                         attr = ProcessVariableDescription(msg->GetRootNode()->children, var_attr);      
00437                 }
00438                 delete msg;
00439                 return attr;
00440         }
00441         return NULL;
00442 }

00444 InOutputAttribut* ControlClient::QueryInputDescription(const SimpleString input_name)
00445 {  
00446         InOutputAttribut* input_attr = FindInput(input_name);
00447         bool name_in_list = true;
00448         if(!input_attr)
00449         {
00450                 if(!NameInList(input_name, listInputName))
00451                 {
00452                         OmiscidTrace( "Unknown Input '%s', ask to the service.\n",input_name.GetStr());
00453                         name_in_list = false;
00454                 }
00455         }
00456 
00457         SimpleString requete = "<"+InOutputAttribut::input_str+" name=\"" + SimpleString(input_name) + "\"/>";
00458         XMLMessage* msg = QueryToServer(requete);
00459         if(msg)
00460         {
00461                 InOutputAttribut* attr = NULL;
00462                 if(msg->GetRootNode()->children != NULL)
00463                 {
00464                         attr = ProcessInputDescription(msg->GetRootNode()->children, input_attr);
00465                 }
00466                 if(!input_attr && attr) listInputAttr.Add(attr);
00467                 else if(input_attr && !attr)
00468                 {
00469                         listInputAttr.Remove(input_attr);
00470                         delete input_attr;
00471                 }
00472 
00473                 if(name_in_list && !attr) listInputName.Remove(input_name);
00474                 else if(!name_in_list && attr) listInputName.Add(input_name);
00475 
00476                 delete msg;
00477                 //std::cerr << "Retour de Process\n";
00478                 return attr;
00479         }
00480         //std::cerr << "No Message \n";
00481         return NULL;

00524 InOutputAttribut* ControlClient::QueryInOutputDescription(const SimpleString in_output_name)
00525 {
00526         InOutputAttribut* in_output_attr = FindInOutput(in_output_name);
00527         bool name_in_list = true;
00528         if(!in_output_attr)
00529         {
00530                 if(!NameInList(in_output_name, listInOutputName))
00531                 {
00532                         OmiscidTrace( "Unknown InOutput '%s', ask to the service.\n", in_output_name.GetStr());
00533                         name_in_list = false;
00534                 }
00535         }
00536 
00537         SimpleString requete = "<"+InOutputAttribut::inoutput_str+" name=\"" + SimpleString(in_output_name) + "\"/>";
00538         XMLMessage* msg = QueryToServer(requete);
00539         if(msg)
00540         {
00541                 InOutputAttribut* attr = NULL;
00542                 if(msg->GetRootNode()->children != NULL)
00543                 {
00544                         attr = ProcessInOutputDescription(msg->GetRootNode()->children, in_output_attr);
00545                 }
00546                 if(!in_output_attr && attr) listInOutputAttr.Add(attr);
00547                 else if(in_output_attr && !attr)
00548                 {
00549                         listInOutputAttr.Remove(in_output_attr);
00550                         delete in_output_attr;
00551                 }
00552 
00553                 if(name_in_list && !attr) listInOutputName.Remove(in_output_name);
00554                 else if(!name_in_list && attr) listInOutputName.Add(in_output_name);
00555 
00556                 delete msg;
00557                 //std::cerr << "Retour de Process\n";
00558                 return attr;
00559         }
00560         //std::cerr << "No Message \n";
00561         return NULL;
00562 }

00564 bool ControlClient::QueryDetailedDescription()
00565 {
00566         SimpleString requete = "<fullDescription/>";
00567         XMLMessage* msg = QueryToServer(requete);
00568         if ( msg )
00569         {
00570                 ProcessDetailedDescription( msg );
00571 
00572                 // delete msg
00573                 delete msg;
00574         }
00575 
00576         return true;
00577 }
00578 
00579 XMLMessage* ControlClient::QueryToServer(SimpleString& requete, bool wait_answer)
00580 {
00581         unsigned int msg_id = BeginEndTag(requete);
00582 
00583 #ifdef DEBUG
00584         // In debug mode, we validate xml before sending it, but nevertheless we send it...
00585         // just for warning and conformity
00586         if ( ControlQueryValidator.ValidateDoc( requete ) == false )
00587         {
00588                 OmiscidError( "ControlClient::QueryToServer: bad query sent.\n" );
00589         }
00590 #endif
00591 
00592         AnswerWaiter * pWaiter = NULL;
00593 
00594         // Create an answer waiter
00595         if ( wait_answer == true )
00596         {
00597                 pWaiter = CreateAnswerWaiter( msg_id );
00598                 if ( pWaiter == NULL )
00599                 {
00600                         return NULL;
00601                 }
00602         }
00603 
00604         if ( SendToServer((int)requete.GetLength(), requete.GetStr()) == SOCKET_ERROR )
00605         {
00606                 // If we can not send data, free the waiter...
00607                 pWaiter->Free();
00608                 return NULL;
00609         }
00610 
00611         if ( wait_answer == false ) // For request without answer like (un)subscribe...
00612         {
00613                 // Ok, we will not wait for anything...
00614                 return NULL;
00615         }
00616 
00617         return pWaiter->GetAnswer(TIME_TO_WAIT_ANSWER);
00618 }
00619 
00620 unsigned int ControlClient::BeginEndTag(SimpleString& str)
00621 {
00622         TemporaryMemoryBuffer tmp(10);
00623         snprintf((char*)tmp, 10, "%08x", id);
00624         id++;
00625         SimpleString tmp_str(tmp);
00626         str = "<controlQuery id=\"" + tmp_str + "\">"
00627                 + str
00628                 + "</controlQuery>";
00629 
00630         return id - 1;
00631 }
00632 
00633 void ControlClient::ProcessGlobalDescription(XMLMessage* xml_msg)
00634 {
00635         Init();
00636 
00637         xmlNodePtr cur_node = xml_msg->GetRootNode()->children;
00638         for(; cur_node; cur_node = cur_node->next)
00639         {
00640                 const char* node_name = (const char*)cur_node->name;
00641 
00642                 xmlAttrPtr attr_name = XMLMessage::FindAttribute("name", cur_node);
00643                 if(attr_name)
00644                 {
00645                         SimpleString name((const char*)attr_name->children->content);
00646 
00647                         if( VariableAttribut::variable_str == node_name )
00648                         {
00649                                 listVariableName.Add(name);
00650                         }
00651                         else if( InOutputAttribut::input_str == node_name )
00652                         {
00653                                 listInputName.Add(name);
00654                         }
00655                         else if( InOutputAttribut::output_str == node_name )
00656                         {
00657                                 listOutputName.Add(name);
00658                         }
00659                         else if( InOutputAttribut::inoutput_str == node_name )
00660                         {
00661                                 listInOutputName.Add(name);
00662                         }
00663                         else
00664                         {
00665                                 OmiscidError( "unwaited tag : %s\n", node_name);
00666                         }
00667                 }
00668         }
00669 }
00670 
00671 void ControlClient::ProcessDetailedDescription(XMLMessage* xml_msg)
00672 {
00673         InOutputAttribut * pAtt;
00674         VariableAttribut * pVar;
00675 
00676         Init();
00677 
00678         // Reset
00679         xmlNodePtr cur_node = xml_msg->GetRootNode()->children;   
00680         for(; cur_node; cur_node = cur_node->next)
00681         {
00682                 SimpleString name = (const char*)(cur_node->name);
00683                 // std::cerr << "tag name="<<(*it)->name <<"\n";
00684                 if( name == InOutputAttribut::input_str.GetStr() )      // an Inpout
00685                 {
00686                         pAtt = ProcessInputDescription( cur_node, NULL );
00687                         if ( pAtt != NULL )
00688                         {
00689                                 listInputName.Add( pAtt->GetName() );
00690                                 listInputAttr.Add( pAtt );
00691                         }
00692                 }
00693                 else if ( name == InOutputAttribut::output_str.GetStr() ) // an Output
00694                 {
00695                         pAtt = ProcessOutputDescription( cur_node, NULL );
00696                         if ( pAtt != NULL )
00697                         {
00698                                 listOutputName.Add( pAtt->GetName() );
00699                                 listOutputAttr.Add( pAtt );
00700                         }
00701                 }
00702                 else if ( name == InOutputAttribut::inoutput_str.GetStr() ) // an InOutput
00703                 {
00704                         pAtt = ProcessInOutputDescription( cur_node, NULL );
00705                         if ( pAtt != NULL )
00706                         {
00707                                 listInOutputName.Add( pAtt->GetName() );
00708                                 listInOutputAttr.Add( pAtt );
00709                         }
00710                 }
00711                 else if( name == VariableAttribut::variable_str.GetStr() )
00712                 {
00713                         pVar = ProcessVariableDescription( cur_node, NULL );
00714                         if ( pVar != NULL )
00715                         {
00716                                 listVariableName.Add( pVar->GetName() );
00717                                 listVariableAttr.Add( pVar );
00718                         }
00719                 }
00720                 else
00721                 {
00722                         // Should not appear
00723                         OmiscidError( "unknown tag : %s\n", name.GetStr() );
00724                 }
00725         }        
00726         // OmiscidError( "Send : %s \n", str.GetStr());
00727 }
00728 
00729 VariableAttribut* ControlClient::ProcessVariableDescription(xmlNodePtr node, 
00730                                                                                                                         VariableAttribut* var_attr)
00731 {
00732         if( !node || VariableAttribut::variable_str != (const char*)node->name )
00733                 return NULL;
00734 
00735 #if defined DEBUG
00736         // XMLMessage::DisplayNode(node, stderr);
00737 #endif
00738 
00739         VariableAttribut* vattr = NULL;
00740         if(var_attr)
00741         {
00742                 vattr = var_attr;
00743         }
00744         else
00745         {
00746                 vattr = new VariableAttribut();
00747         }
00748 
00749         vattr->ExtractDataFromXml(node);
00750 
00751         return vattr;
00752 }
00753 
00754 InOutputAttribut* ControlClient::ProcessInputDescription(xmlNodePtr node, InOutputAttribut* input_attr)
00755 {
00756         //std::cerr << "ControlClient::ProcessInputDescription : Not Yet Implemented\n";
00757         if( !node || InOutputAttribut::input_str != (const char*)node->name )
00758                 return NULL;
00759         InOutputAttribut* inattr = NULL;
00760         if(input_attr) inattr = input_attr;
00761         else inattr = new InOutputAttribut("", AnInput);
00762 
00763         inattr->ExtractDataFromXml(node);
00764 
00765         return inattr;
00766 }
00767 InOutputAttribut* ControlClient::ProcessOutputDescription(xmlNodePtr node, InOutputAttribut* output_attr)
00768 {
00769         //std::cerr << "ControlClient::ProcessOutputDescription : Not Yet Implemented\n"; 
00770         if(!node || InOutputAttribut::output_str != (const char*)node->name )
00771                 return NULL;
00772         InOutputAttribut* outattr = NULL;
00773         if(output_attr)
00774         {
00775                 outattr = output_attr;
00776         }
00777         else
00778         {
00779                 outattr = new InOutputAttribut(SimpleString::EmptyString, AnOutput);
00780         }
00781         outattr->ExtractDataFromXml(node);
00782 
00783         return outattr;
00784 }
00785 InOutputAttribut* ControlClient::ProcessInOutputDescription(xmlNodePtr node, InOutputAttribut* in_output_attr)
00786 {
00787         //std::cerr << "ControlClient::ProcessInOutputDescription : Not Yet Implemented\n"; 
00788         if(!node || InOutputAttribut::inoutput_str != (const char*)node->name) 
00789                 return NULL;
00790         InOutputAttribut* in_outattr = NULL;
00791         if(in_output_attr) in_outattr = in_output_attr;
00792         else in_outattr = new InOutputAttribut("", AnInOutput);
00793 
00794         in_outattr->ExtractDataFromXml(node);
00795 
00796         return in_outattr;
00797 }

00799 void ControlClient::DisplayListName(SimpleList<SimpleString>& list_name, 
00800                                                                         const SimpleString& entete)
00801 {
00802         printf("%s\n", entete.GetStr());  
00803         for(list_name.First(); list_name.NotAtEnd(); list_name.Next())
00804         {
00805                 printf("\t %s\n", (list_name.GetCurrent()).GetStr());
00806         }
00807 }
00808 
00809 bool ControlClient::NameInList(const SimpleString name, SimpleList<SimpleString>& list_name)
00810 {
00811         for(list_name.First(); list_name.NotAtEnd(); list_name.Next())
00812         {
00813                 if(list_name.GetCurrent() == name) return true;
00814         }
00815         return false;
00816 }

00818 
00819 VariableAttribut* ControlClient::FindVariable(const SimpleString name)
00820 {
00821         for(listVariableAttr.First(); listVariableAttr.NotAtEnd();
00822                 listVariableAttr.Next())
00823         {
00824                 if(( listVariableAttr.GetCurrent())->GetName() == name) 
00825                         return  listVariableAttr.GetCurrent();
00826         }
00827         return NULL;
00828 }
00829 InOutputAttribut* ControlClient::FindInput(const SimpleString name)
00830 {
00831         for(listInputAttr.First(); listInputAttr.NotAtEnd(); listInputAttr.Next())
00832         {
00833                 if((listInputAttr.GetCurrent())->GetName() == name)
00834                         return listInputAttr.GetCurrent();
00835         }
00836         return NULL;
00837 }
00838 InOutputAttribut* ControlClient::FindOutput(const SimpleString name)
00839 {
00840         for(listOutputAttr.First(); listOutputAttr.NotAtEnd(); listOutputAttr.Next())
00841         {
00842                 if((listOutputAttr.GetCurrent())->GetName() == name) 
00843                         return listOutputAttr.GetCurrent();
00844         }
00845         return NULL;
00846 }

00848 {

00850                 listInOutputAttr.Next())
00851         {
00852                 if((listInOutputAttr.GetCurrent())->GetName() == name) 
00853                         return listInOutputAttr.GetCurrent();
00854         }
00855         return NULL;

00857 
00858 void ControlClient::Subscribe(const SimpleString var_name)
00859 {
00860         VariableAttribut* va = FindVariable(var_name);
00861         if ( va )
00862         {
00863                 SimpleString request("<subscribe name=\"");
00864                 request = request + va->GetName()  +"\"/>";
00865                 XMLMessage* msg = QueryToServer(request, true);
00866                 if ( msg )
00867                 {
00868                         if(msg->GetRootNode()->children != NULL)
00869                         {
00870                                 ProcessVariableDescription(msg->GetRootNode()->children, va);      
00871                         }
00872                 }
00873         }
00874         else
00875         {
00876                 OmiscidTrace( "variable unknown by client\n");
00877         }
00878 }
00879 void ControlClient::Unsubscribe(const SimpleString var_name)
00880 {
00881         VariableAttribut* va = FindVariable(var_name);
00882         if(va)
00883         {
00884                 SimpleString request("<unsubscribe name=\"");
00885                 request = request + va->GetName()  +"\"/>";
00886                 QueryToServer(request, false);
00887         }
00888         else
00889         {
00890                 OmiscidTrace( "variable unknown by client\n");
00891         }
00892 }
00893 
00894 void ControlClient::ProcessAMessage(XMLMessage* msg)
00895 {
00896         if ( msg == NULL )
00897         {
00898                 // Nothing to do
00899                 return;
00900         }
00901 
00902         // Validate against XSD schema
00903         if ( ControlAnswerValidator.ValidateDoc( msg->doc ) == false )
00904         {
00905                 // bad message...
00906                 OmiscidError( "ControlClient::ProcessAMessage: bad controlAnswer/controlEvent.\n" );
00907                 return;
00908         }
00909 
00910         if( strcmp((const char*)msg->GetRootNode()->name, "controlAnswer") ==0 )
00911         {
00912                 // Set the message and way to the rigth Waiter that is ok
00913                 PushAnswer(msg);
00914         }
00915         else if( strcmp((const char*)msg->GetRootNode()->name, "controlEvent") == 0 )
00916         {
00917                 CtrlEventProcess( msg );
00918                 if ( callback != NULL )
00919                 {
00920                         callback(msg, userDataPtr);
00921                 }
00922         }
00923 }
00924 
00925 void ControlClient::CtrlEventProcess(XMLMessage* msg)
00926 {
00927         xmlNodePtr node = msg->GetRootNode();
00928 
00929         xmlNodePtr current = node->children;
00930 
00931         for(; current != NULL; current = current->next)
00932         {
00933                 const char* cur_name = (const char*)current->name;
00934                 if( VariableAttribut::variable_str == cur_name )
00935                 {
00936                         xmlAttrPtr attr_name = XMLMessage::FindAttribute("name", current);
00937                         VariableAttribut* va = FindVariable((const char*)attr_name->children->content);
00938                         if(va)
00939                         {
00940                                 xmlNodePtr val_node = XMLMessage::FindFirstChild("value", current);
00941                                 if (val_node)
00942                                 {
00943                                         va->SetValue((const char*)val_node->children->content);
00944                                 }
00945                         }
00946                         else
00947                         {
00948                                 OmiscidError( "in CtrlEventProcess : Unknown variable %s\n", (const char*)attr_name->children->content);          
00949                         }
00950                 }
00951                 else
00952                 {
00953                         OmiscidError( "in CtrlEventProcess : Unknown control event :%s\n", cur_name);
00954                 }
00955         }
00956 }
